ygData.subject: Re: Damn.
ygData.msgSnippet: I always love how people gripe about the gripes and then gripe about those gripes and then other people have to me too, me too. My post was an I m sick of
ygData.messageBody:
I always love how people gripe about the gripes and then gripe
about those gripes and then other people have to me
too, me too.

My post was an "I'm sick of hearing post after post about your damn club,
it's not why I joined the list" post. Sorry it just ended up
creating even more noise. Yall can say good riddance or whatever,
I'm off the list. Enjoy the din.

Berk Half-Elven

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Glen Colby [mailto:voidchld@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 1:40 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Damn.
>
>
> From: "Glen Colby" <voidchld@...>
>
> Hehe, thats what i said, (Kinda)
> Talonstar
> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Kim <bumbler123@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 10:42 PM
> Subject: [eqbards] Damn.
>
>
> >From: James Kim <bumbler123@...>
> >
> >Damn. Yall are like little children. I love coming home, checking my
> >e-mail, and seeing I have 50 new mails, all gripes back and forth about
> >something that doesn't concern most of the people on the list. If you
> >have a gripe, go private with it, and at least respect the people on
> >the list that are on the list to enrich their bardic experience, not to
> >be the jury in a really stupid debate. As for the Soarbairds, they're
> >going to do what they're going to do, no matter what anyone else says,
> >so there ain't no use gripin about it to everyone. If people are going
> >to join, they're going to, no matter what you say. I hate to say it,
> >but all of you guys griping and badmouthing, aren't doing a DAMN thing
> >except wasting a lot of people's time and filling their boxes with junk
> >mail. Thanks.
> >
> >
